name: Ambrosia
description: Stemming from her parents, God Bud and Burmese, the Ambrosia strain is a high that will hit you almost instantaneously and will be felt throughout your body. Her mother, Burmese is a sativa from the Mighty Mite Seed Company and was voted #1 People's Choice at the Cannabis Culture Toker's Bowl in 2002. For dad, God Bud from Jordan of the Islands, is a mostly indica plant, popular for it's tropical sweet flavor. Ambrosia produces a large amount of dense and sticky buds with yellow leaves and orange hairs.
descriptionPlain: Stemming from her parents, God Bud and Burmese, the Ambrosia strain is a high that will hit you almost instantaneously and will be felt throughout your body. Her mother, Burmese is a sativa from the Mighty Mite Seed Company and was voted #1 People's Choice at the Cannabis Culture Toker's Bowl in 2002. For dad, God Bud from Jordan of the Islands, is a mostly indica plant, popular for it's tropical sweet flavor. Ambrosia produces a large amount of dense and sticky buds with yellow leaves and orange hairs.

highlightedReviews.text: I really liked the way this strain smelled. really fruity and sweet. I smoked two bongs between me and my housemate and we just watched the sunset from our porch. Super happy high. Definitely made the stresses of the day slip away. Smashed a honey bun like nobodies business and now I can't feel my leg.

A great strain to vape if you want to have a staring contest with your cat. Seriously; you think you know your cat pretty well, but if you really lock eyes with the creature and allow the mind-meld to sluice on through, you realize you don't know shit about what's going on in that furry little feline head, and you fully grok that all this time you've been sharing your house with a little four footed alien. 

Oh and this strain also gives some serious cottonmouth, so make sure to have some cold fizzy water on hand.
